channel.title: Comments on: Checkout your twitter analytics from twitter itself
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: career
item.dc:creator: career
item.description: I actually expoiter this Twitter feature recently and i think its spot on! Great tool, just like Facebook's insight
item.content:encoded:
I actually expoiter this Twitter feature recently and i think its spot on!
Great tool, just like Facebook’s insight

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.content:encoded:
Not sure, Denis. But I did go to the right URL. üòâ

I’ll try to check again later. I have had my account for a while but didn’t start actively using it until a couple of years ago. So maybe it’s for more active users?

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Updated this post with the Followers screenshot
item.content:encoded: Updated this post with the Followers screenshot

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Interesting, a co-worker doesn't see the analytics tab either. I wonder if they are doing a staggered rollout. Maybe the people who signed up earliest for twitter get it first, or maybe it goes my number of followers or tweets?
item.content:encoded: Interesting, a co-worker doesn’t see the analytics tab either. I wonder if they are doing a staggered rollout. Maybe the people who signed up earliest for twitter get it first, or maybe it goes my number of followers or tweets?

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Koen, maybe it is US only for now?
item.content:encoded: Koen, maybe it is US only for now?

item.title: By: job
item.dc:creator: job
item.description: Has Twitter started allowing ads like on Facebook. Thanks for the info on the analytics tho
item.content:encoded: Has Twitter started allowing ads like on Facebook. Thanks for the info on the analytics tho

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.content:encoded:
It keeps insisting I should remove adblock and won’t work.

Or disable it.

item.description: Signed into ads as well, but also no analytics for me. Sad trombone :(

item.description: You singed into <a href="https://ads.twitter.com/">https://ads.twitter.com/</a> not just twitter right?
item.content:encoded: You singed into https://ads.twitter.com/ not just twitter right?

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Interesting. But it's worth noting that I do not get an option for Analytics once I sign in.
item.content:encoded: Interesting. But it’s worth noting that I do not get an option for Analytics once I sign in.
